scripts.build: "$npm_execpath" run clean; git submodule update --recursive --remote; svgr src/Icon -d stage1; find stage1 -type f -name "*.js" -print0 | xargs -0 sed -i 's/width={30} height={30}/viewBox="0 0 30 30" height="1em" width="1em" preserveAspectRatio="xMinYMin" style={{fill: "currentColor"}}/'; create-index stage1; babel stage1 -d icons
